channel.title: Npc drop help
channel.description:
this is from my drop file
npcdrop = 1267 6128 1 10
how do i change it so it will drop a cetain percent of the time per say i wanted code 8002 for 100% of time what would i edit (im not that much of a noob to have d claws 100% its a example)

item.title: Npc drop help
item.dc:creator: @lungxapples lungxapples
item.description:
@lungxapples wrote:

No the 1 is how many of that item it will drop… so for example you wanted to drop 5000 Noted dragon claws that number would be 5000 then the “10” is the percent out of “100”.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc drop help
item.dc:creator: @crimim crimim
item.description:
@crimim wrote:

[quote=“early, post:2, topic:345278”]npcdrop = 1267 6128 1 10 … easy to do the 1267 is the id of npc. the 6128 is the item its dropping. the 1 is how many times. the 10 means 10&
heres the code you would want to use 8002 and 100% npcdrop = 1267 8002 1 109[/quote]

1 is how many times out of what?

Read full topic

item.description:
@system wrote:

npcdrop = 1267 6128 1 10 … easy to do the 1267 is the id of npc. the 6128 is the item its dropping. the 1 is how many times. the 10 means 10&
heres the code you would want to use 8002 and 100% npcdrop = 1267 8002 1 109
